mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Lee, Robert E. (Robert Edward), 1807-1870
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Lee writes faculty member and alumnus John L. Campbell to commend Campbell's son and namesake on his academic achievement. John L. Campbell, Jr. was a member of Washington College's Class of 1875-1876. This letter was written by Prof. C. J. Harris and signed by Lee.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Harris, C. J.
Washington College (Lexington, Va.) -- Students
Campbell, J. L. (John Lyle), 1818-1886
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter from R. E. Lee to Prof. John L. Campbell, June 28, 1870 (correspondence)
